title: Sudden extremely low fps problems
body:
Ive been playing league of legends for about 3 years now,and have had my fair share of problems with the game,but this problem has overpowered me.
after a few games ive played today,and have had normal ping and fps in,i log in a ranked game,to find out i have 1-10 constant fps,regardless of my video/graphics status.
i have updated my drivers and couldnt find a solution online,this is my last resort.
has anyone else encountered this problem,and if so,is there a way to fix this?

replies.body:
There are a couple of things that could be causing this, however, I think there's a few we can get out of the way pretty quickly. First, if you're on Windows 10, be sure you've [disabled the Windows Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), as it causes FPS issues and PC crashes for certain players.

If you're not on Win 10, or if that step didn't cause a change, your solution is likely listed in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). I'd recommend going over every step, then letting me know if anything's changed as a result of those steps.
